name: Egg (RoastedCactus)
description:
A game wherin you find yourself locked in an abandoned house.... that's surrounded by living flesh!

-Controls-

WASD - walking

Leftclick - interaction with objects

1 and 2 - selecting between objects

-Warning-

This is more a proof of concept than a full game. It's techincally beatable and looseable, but it's miles from a cohesive experience.

-Developed by-

Gargantuan Head Eating Spider 

Daen

MHickman

RoastedCactus
